cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5717

description: The papd daemon in Netatalk before 2.0.4-beta2, when using certain variables in a pipe command for the print file, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in a print request, as demonstrated using a crafted Title.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5718

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Hitachi Groupmax Web Workflow SDK Set for Active Server Pages before 06-52-/C and Hitachi Groupmax Workflow - Development Kit for Active Server Pages before 06-52-/A allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5719

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Mayaa before 1.1.23 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors involving the default error page for the org.seasar.mayaa.impl.engine.PageNotFoundException exception and possibly other exceptions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5720

description: SapporoWorks BlackJumboDog (BJD) before 4.2.3 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication and obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5721

description: Buffer overflow in SAWStudio 3.9i allows user-assisted remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a long SAWSTUDIO PREFERENCES STRUCT value in a .prf (preferences) file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5722

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in CGI RESCUE KanniBBS2000 (aka KanniBBS2000i, MiniBBS2000, and MiniBBS2000i) before 1.03 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5723

description: The Personal Firewall driver (aka epfw.sys) 3.0.672.0 and earlier in ESET Smart Security 3.0.672 and earlier allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted IRP in a certain METHOD_NEITHER IOCTL request to \Device\Epfw that overwrites portions of memory.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5724

description: The NT kernel-mode driver (aka pstrip.sys) 5.0.1.1 and earlier in EnTech Taiwan PowerStrip 3.84 and earlier allows local users to gain privileges via certain IRP parameters in an IOCTL request to \Device\Powerstrip1 that overwrites portions of memory.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5725

description: SQL injection vulnerability in thread.php in stormBoards 1.0.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5726

description: SQL injection vulnerability in modules/auth/password_recovery.php in AIST NetCat 3.12 and earlier, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the query string.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5727

description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in AIST NetCat 3.12 and earlier, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled and register_globals is enabled, allow remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via a .. (dot dot) in (1) the system parameter in modules/netshop/post.php; and the INCLUDE_FOLDER parameter in (2) auth.inc.php, (3) banner.inc.php, (4) blog.inc.php, and (5) forum.inc.php in modules/.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-5728
